info.smart_tools.smartactors.utils.scope

Class ScopeGuard

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.smart_tools.smartactors.utils.scope.ScopeGuard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class ScopeGuard
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    An auto-closeable object which on creation sets the current scope for the thread to new value. When close() is called - the current scope for thread is set back to the value before creation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Sets current scope to initial value.
      static ScopeGuard withNewLocalScope()
      Creates an ScopeGuard which on creation sets current scope to new scope with current scope as parent.
      static ScopeGuard withNewLocalScope(Scope parentScope)
      Creates an ScopeGuard which on creation sets current scope to new scope with defined parent scope.
      static ScopeGuard withScope(Scope scope)
      Creates an ScopeGuard which on creation sets current scope to defined one.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
